metadata.title: CVE-2022-22976 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Spring Security versions 5.5.x prior to 5.5.7, 5.6.x prior to 5.6.4, andearlier unsupported versions contain an integer overflow vulnerability.When using the BCrypt class with the maximum work factor (31), the encoderdoes not perform any salt rounds, due to an integer overflow error. Thedefault settings are not affected by this CVE.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
